name: desoximetasone
indications: Desoximetasone Ointment USP, 0.25% is indicated for the relief of the inflammatory and pruritic manifestations of corticosteroid-responsive dermatoses.
contraindications: Apply a thin film of Desoximetasone Ointment USP, 0.25% to the affected skin areas twice daily. Rub in gently.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Desoximetasone Ointment USP, 0.25% is supplied as follows:
                  15 gram tube (NDC 72162-1414-2)
                  60 gram tube (NDC 72162-1414-6)
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:
                  Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.
                  Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions: Desoximetasone ointment USP, 0.25% is contraindicated in those patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of the components of the preparation.
